summary:
Research and Teaching 
Two main research lines: 
- Tectonic and sedimentary evolution of rifted margins, with particular focus on NW Africa and Brazil
- Fractured reservoirs integrating outcrop data, mechanic and flow modelling. 
In both, great progress in the last years (check papers!)

And, at least as important, teaching, my great passion: developing courses for all levels, giving classes in different parts of the world, making people enthusiastic about geology and aware of its importance in society.
